ComicInfo.Title: In the Clutches of Countess Peril; Blackjack; Battle Beyond Reality
ComicInfo.Summary:
The story of a mystical blackjack is intertwined with the tale of an analysis of Earth's comics performed by Dr. Heinrich Wirtham as he realizes it is being used in the comics as part of a ritual to open a dimensional gate.
While chained to a giant swastika, Miss Victory is menaced by a topless Nazi woman.
Tara follows a vision into a subaquatic cave.
The Phantom Lady waits outside a theater advertising a film that appears to show her fighting Black Cat. She enters the theater and thereby enters the film, a surreal nightmare of shifting images, fights, and brief nudity.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 21:42:48. [CVDB143109] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 19:34:12. [Issue ID 315105]
